short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill each  tab with adorable cat photos to brighten your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seeking a purrrrfect way to spice up your Chrome browsing experience? Meet Cute Cats NewTab, the ultimate new tab extension for those who are crazy about cats! With Cute Cats NewTab, every time you spring open a new tab in Chrome, you'll be greeted with a pawsitively adorable cat background that's sure to put a smile on your face.

But there's more! CuteCatsTab also includes a handy search feature right on your new tab page. This means you can paw through the web quickly and easily without having to leave your tab. By installing CuteCatsTab, you're saying yes to our License Agreement and Privacy Policy, and getting to use Bing's reliable search engine.

Ready to infuse your browsing routine with a feline finesse? Adopt CuteCatsTab today and bask in a meow-velous cuteness overload each time you open a new tab!

CuteCatsTab search functions that are being in use by the extension â€“ will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the My Music History extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

EULA/Terms of Service - https://www.cutecatstab.com/termsofservice
Privacy Policy - https://www.cutecatstab.com/privacypolicy

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears, click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed extensions, find the name of the extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. The extension should be removed from your browser.
